body_html: It's not wontfix as in "we will never accept them into autograd". It's just not very high on our priority list and it's not straightforward to write out derivative formulas for them, but if you feel up to it then please send PRs!
body_text: It's not wontfix as in "we will never accept them into autograd". It's just not very high on our priority list and it's not straightforward to write out derivative formulas for them, but if you feel up to it then please send PRs!
body: It's not wontfix as in "we will never accept them into autograd". It's just not very high on our priority list and it's not straightforward to write out derivative formulas for them, but if you feel up to it then please send PRs!
